nodes.text: Justin Ridge was the Supervising Director and Executive Producer for Star Wars Resistance. He was also an episodic director and storyboard artist for Star Wars: The Clone Wars, a CGI television series that debuted October 3, 2008 on Cartoon Network as a continuation of the film of the same name, released two months prior. Like the series' showrunner, Dave Filoni, Ridge was also previously an assistant director, screenplay, and storyboard artist for Avatar: The Last Airbender.
